FlowOrchestrationVersion.name: FlowOrchestrationVersion
FlowOrchestrationVersion.description: Represents the version of an orchestration.

ActivatedById.description: The ID of the user that activated the orchestration.

ActivatedDate.description: The date and time when the orchestration was activated.

ApiVersion.description: The API version of this orchestration record version.

Description.description: The description of the flow orchestration version.

FlowOrchestrationId.description: The ID of the parent orchestration running this version.

IsOverridable.description: Indicates whether the orchestration that's part of a managed package is overridable.

IsTemplate.description: Indicates whether the orchestration record version is a template.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

OrchestrationType.description: The orchestration's flow type. FlowType consolidates ProcessType and TriggerType into one field. FlowType is used with permissions, so admins can control access to each flow type.

OverriddenById.description: The ID of the orchestration that's overriding the current orchestration.

OverriddenOrchestrationId.description: The ID of the orchestration that the current orchestration is overriding.

RunInMode.description: The mode that the orchestration runs in.

Status.description: The ID of the template that the orchestration was created from. This is a relationship field.(Refers to Orchestration Record).

TriggerObjectOrEventLabel.description: The label of the object or platform event that triggers this flow.

VersionNumber.description: The version number of the orchestration version.
